name: Makara Aspect
effect: Channel your piety and reverence to strengthen the buwaya you ride upon, turning them into a legendary makara. You become Size 2 (Height 2), you ignore all terrain, you Heal 1 when you start your riff, and you gain +1 to your Posture and Resilience.

name: Rudrakasha’s Bulu
effect: Declare a bulu, a duel-to-the-death on a fighter in range 3. Until the end of the encounter, they cannot attack any other fighter that is not you. If they do, they suffer 1 True Hit. You similarly suffer -3d to all attacks that don’t include your bulu partner as a target. You and your bulu partner become immune to taunts not from each other and neither of you can be forcibly moved by other warriors.

name: Pangayaw
effect: Unleash a thousand strikes in a picosecond to finish off an opponent. Rush twice, and then INFLICT VIOLENCE six times. Each attack is Relentless and Overwhelming.

name: Siday Sa Gubat
effect: Sing that song of life and death, culminating in a breaking verse. Choose a single fighter in the battlefield that can hear you. Until the end of violence, they cannot make attacks or any other hostile action. Chiefs and Braves lose -1 Riff.

name: Glory
effect:
You open your soul and finally achieve minor liberation. Attain Temporary Glory until the end of Violence. While you have Temporary Glory, you have the following benefits:
  • Whenever you suffer Hits you heal that much instead
  • Any amount of heal that brings you above your maximum HP gives you stacking Block instead.
  • Your Hits heal instead of reducing HP. All allies in the battlefield gain +1 to all Prowesses.
